opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Lockheed Martin Corp. v. Space Systems/loral, Inc

opinion:
535 U.S. 1109

LOCKHEED MARTIN CORP.
v.
SPACE SYSTEMS/LORAL, INC.

No. 01-506.

Supreme Court of the United States.

June 3, 2002.

1

C. A. Fed. Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Festo Corp. v. Shoketsu Kinzoku Kogyo Kabushiki Co., ante, p. 722. Reported below: 249 F. 3d 1314.
